snippet.title: Atari 2600 Longplay [077] Gangster Alley (US)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: RickyC

The manual says that the game will pause/stop for when you reload. However no matter what I pressed I could never reload in time to get back into the game without being shot.

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
